name: Spectacular Shatter Buddies
description:
Spectacular Shatter Buddies is a platform fighting game heavily influenced by the popular Super Smash Bros. Melee.

This game attempts to explore the genre of platform fighters, specifically by providing a more accessible experience. This starts with being significantly less technically demanding to facilitate easier access to the heart of platform fighters and also by including seamless online play on the PC and compatibility with various input devices.

If you have any questions about the game or interesting ideas for me to consider, please join the Discord server!
Some of your questions might be answered in the FAQ or by the public Trello ToDo list, so make sure to look there first.

If you are a musician or have some competency in sound design for video games and are interested in my game, please contact me!
